website_summaries.verdict: Sensible shoes that don't look sensible. Still, not as much arch support as other Vionic styles.
pros: Adjustable hook-and-loop closures at toe and ankle
Cushioned footbed with contoured forefoot and a deep heel cup
Received the APMA Seal of Acceptance
Chunky, stacked heel gives style and stability
cons: Takes time to break them in
Less arch support than other styles

customer_reviews.title: Classy and Comfortable!!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this sandal but must warn - You must break them in!! Got several nasty blisters from just putting them on and going... Make sure you wear them around and see if you have any sensitive spots then... Wear and Enjoy (with bandaids on the possible blister points!!)
customer_reviews.author: Madison

customer_reviews.title: Cheap quality
customer_reviews.text: I'm extremely dissapointed by these shoes. I bought them two weeks ago, wore them once to a baby shower and the front tip already peeled off! I paid over $100 for these shoes, that's ridiculous. They should have lasted more than one use.
customer_reviews.author: Rosa R.

customer_reviews.title: The perfect vionic shoe
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are absolutely beautiful. The heels are perfect for dresses, pants, and to because of the style to dress down with jeans. The support us perfect. A couple of the reviews stated that the top bands cut across their foot. The leather is so soft my shoes did not cut at all not even the first time I wore them. I absolutely love them. I will probably order them in the tan as soon as they are available in my size
customer_reviews.author: dj

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous look; disappointing fit.
customer_reviews.text: This fit looks to be adjustable; but the strap comes up way too high on my ankle. The other strap gave me a blister from rubbing on my 3rd toe after wearing them around the house for only an hour. Planned to wear these to a wedding next month, doubt they will be a good choice. I will tape my toe and try a heel insert to see if that helps. Quite a disappointment since I really love they way they look. My first disappointing VIONIC shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shoes Hot and Sensible!!
customer_reviews.text: Love them!!! They still need some breaking in. I'm known by my girlfriends as the person wearing " sensible shoes" the other day I was wearing these and my girlfriend said " those don't look sensible"! So these are Hot, but secretly sensible which I love I'm probably going to buy the black pair too
customer_reviews.author: H. Kane

customer_reviews.title: Cute Comfortable Sandals
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are just so comfortable - I own three pairs (2 black and 1 caramel color). The ankle and ball of the feet straps are adjustable so one can get a very good custom fit. Coupled with the bionic arch I can wear these all day with no issues. Received a lot of compliments as well because they look very cute on.
customer_reviews.author: Work2Hard

customer_reviews.title: Vionic Rocks
customer_reviews.text: I have very difficult feet!! This is a beautifully made shoe with great arch support. The reason I had to return it was the heel cup. It was way too wide for my skinny heels. If it had been a strap back I would have kept it. I see Vionic is beginning to make narrow shoes so I'll just wait and hope they make one I can wear.
customer_reviews.author: Susie

customer_reviews.title: Vionic shoes ROCK!
customer_reviews.text: I'm officially a Vionic girl! These are not quite as comfortable as the wedge platforms but they are a lot cuter! I love that I can adjust the straps to fit perfectly to my foot. Does not look like an ortho shoe. Trendy and perfect ankle support for work with capris, slacks or church dresses.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Noland

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful shoe meets my orthotic needs
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this sandal. It fits well, is comfortable, and is stylish. I get lots of compliments when I wear it. I have no arch and either need to try to wear the paste in arches or go without. Both are less than optimal options. This shoe has changed everything.
customer_reviews.author: LSE587

customer_reviews.title: Love but my feet don't agree
customer_reviews.text: While I love vionic shoes in general, these shoes are almost too much for my metatarsal head. I can only wear these shoes for a couple of hours maybe. When I did try to wear them for a full work day I was unable to walk the next day. The look of the shoe is wonderful. I wish that my plantar fibromatosis and metatarsalgia would agree.
customer_reviews.author: KLar

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and stylish!
customer_reviews.text: Vionic’s have been recommended by my physician. I own several casual pair of Vionic sandals but recently needed something a little dressier. I wore these very stylish heels all day while on a dinner cruise. My feet swell after walking and standing for long periods of time. The adjustable straps are perfect for this problem.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: I love how Vionic has shifted away from the old-lady looking ...
customer_reviews.text: These are the comfiest heels I've ever worn! I typically only ever wear flats, but the dress i got these to wear with needed these shoes! I love how Vionic has shifted away from the old-lady looking orthotics to the more trendy and stylish looks over the past few years.
customer_reviews.author: Chantal Berube

customer_reviews.title: The support I needed and look nice
customer_reviews.text: These shoes fit well and are very supportive. The only issue is that the fat front strap rubs blisters on my toes. So I had to wear bandaids on almost every toe for the first few weeks. Overall the shoes add the support I need and look nice.
customer_reviews.author: ARed

customer_reviews.title: Lower quality than other Vionics
customer_reviews.text: This is the first pair of Vionics in which I am disappointed. The shoes LOOK great; there is some arch support; however, the construction quality is sub-par. After only one wear, the lining is separating from the shoe. This is not the quality I have come to expect from Vionic.
customer_reviews.author: Susan T.

customer_reviews.title: I love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes, but they were a bit tight at first. I haven't worn heels in forever because they have always made my feet hurt. I bought these to wear at a wedding. Put them on at 5pm and wore them all night long. So comfortable I would forget I had on heels. I've loved all my Vionic shoes so far!
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Vionic Sandals
customer_reviews.text: recommended by my orthopedic surgeon. Best shoe of the 3 recommendations the doctor made. And Vionic seems to be improving the look of the shoes. These shoes no longer look like orthotic shoes. My feet are very happy. So am I! Worth the investment.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are amazing. I love wearing them and get so many compliments. Makes walking in my shoes at work comfortable again! Great quality as well.
customer_reviews.author: V. Knight

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes they are so comfy wore them all ...
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes they are so comfy wore them all day to a church friend ship day my feet didn’t hurt at all and they are so stylish no buckles just simple and clean looking I bought two pair 👍
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoe & well made
customer_reviews.text: Good price for a well made sandal. Practical, but some nice style details that I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: M & J P

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, comfortable, shoe, nice adjustability.
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable, fashionable, appears well made. That's what I like. I have a very wide instep. The adjustable toe strap makes these feel as good as they look!
customer_reviews.author: NDM

customer_reviews.title: Great arch support
customer_reviews.text: Great arch support. My only complaint is that the velcro feels a little cheap. Someday I will achieve my goal of totally fashionable yet supportive footwear. This is close.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria R.

customer_reviews.title: Blk leather shoes
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are good quality and straps allow for fit adjustment which makes these shoes very comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Gloria H Miller

customer_reviews.title: I like the adjustable straps and the heal is just right
customer_reviews.text: The arch is not as much as the other styles. I like the adjustable straps and the heal is just right. I prefer more of an arch support. I probably will have to put in orthotics
customer_reviews.author: CLO6

customer_reviews.title: I really wanted to like these shoes but it doesn't have the same arch ...
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like these shoes but it doesn't have the same arch support the Vionic brand usually has so I returned mine.
customer_reviews.author: Camille

customer_reviews.title: Very well made
customer_reviews.text: These are good sandals, very well made. They fit well, but I had to return them because one strap rubs against my ankle and the other strap rubs against the top of my foot. Probably not a good style for me.
customer_reviews.author: Teddy H

customer_reviews.title: Fits great with adjustable straps to allow for my wider foot
customer_reviews.text: Fits great with adjustable straps to allow for my wider foot. My go to work summer sandal. Wish it was available in more colors (white, taupe)
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wife is one happy Mama
customer_reviews.text: Wife loves these shoes. Lots of adjustment to be had if desired and the price was wonderful. Very satisfied customer
customer_reviews.author: Thomas R. Conlin

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this shoe. It it not THE most comfortable shoe I’ve ever owned, but I can easily wear it for a full day at work with zero pain. Ever since pregnancy collapsed my arches, I’ve had a terrible time with shoes, and these are comfortable and look great. They are also holding up very well after several weeks of near daily use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. I struggle to find stylish shoes with arch support. These are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Toni G.

customer_reviews.title: They look amazing w black cropped dress trousers
customer_reviews.text: Ok must confess i needed a bit of lidocaine on my ankles. I needed these shoes for a funeral. They look amazing w black cropped dress trousers. Heel very stable unlike regular heels. I will wear again. Just not used to straps. I love them...
customer_reviews.author: lliney

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Strap on toes hit toes and rub. Tried wearing tighter and looser and got blisters in different spots. First shoe that looks awesome but hurt feet!
customer_reviews.author: LAURA ROBERTS

customer_reviews.title: Nice to find gorgeous Vionic shoes
customer_reviews.text: Nice to find gorgeous Vionic shoes! Very dressy style so that even I can wear stylish shoes again, and NOT be in pain! Love these!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ❤️ ❤️ ❤️
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these. I have a high arch and these felt great all day at work!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice sandals, and supports well
customer_reviews.text: The sandals looks very nice but it bothers a little at the toes and makes a red mark. It helps alot with a long day with my P.F.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love vionics because of the arch support
customer_reviews.text: Love vionics because of the arch support. I really like the adjustable straps since I have a narrow foot.
customer_reviews.author: Linda R.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful for arthritic feet!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderfully fashionable find for arthritic feet with adjustable velcro straps!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun to wear
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes! My one complaint is the leather “chipped” on the toe almost immediately. It makes a nice, expensive pair of heels look cheap. Other than that, I do love these heels.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Too much weight on the balls fo my feet
customer_reviews.text: Heel to high. too pressure on the balls of my feet. Will b returning them. Wanted to like them. I have lots of vionic shoes. These just didn’t work for me
customer_reviews.author: Gail Shukoski

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: Wow, good arch support. It looks like a lot of effort was put in the design to be so elegantly simple and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware
customer_reviews.text: This shoe does not fit like other Vionics> I have 10 pair of Vionics and this shoe does not fit the same and is very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: JLA

customer_reviews.title: Vionic does it again!
customer_reviews.text: I have a high arch, and wide foot. I love the adjustable straps. The shoe is comfortable enough for a wedding, and Mass.
customer_reviews.author: Noelle Benson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My favorite summer shoe/sandal...very comfortable to wear all day. Great for dress up or casual
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: The fit was perfect and the arch support makes them the most comfortable ...
customer_reviews.text: The sandals exceeded my expectations. The fit was perfect and the arch support makes them the most comfortable heeled sandal I own.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Classic Style, Comfortable Sandals
customer_reviews.text: Cute shoes, stylish, and incredibly comfortable with the cupped heel and adjustable velcro straps. These even feel good with my plantar fascitis. A classic look.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Jones

customer_reviews.title: Great Sandal
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, stable, and stylish shoe. A classic that can be dressed up or down. Have no complaints, except that I wish they they weren't so expensive, but shoes are too important to economize on.
customer_reviews.author: Consumer X

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love thes shoes. Comfortable and can wear all day with great arch support. Bought another pair, different color.
customer_reviews.author: Susie

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Loved the style of the shoe but was very uncomfortable for me.
customer_reviews.author: LSS

customer_reviews.title: Nice Shoe
customer_reviews.text: Cute but returned too large in the ankle for me
customer_reviews.author: Desirée

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Foot slides forward & ankle band does not give much flexibility
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Ward

customer_reviews.title: Pretty, but not comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty shoe, but I did not like the feel of the Velcro around my ankle.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy L.

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable shoes
customer_reviews.text: This is a really comfortable shoe, runs true to size, I like that it is adjustable.
customer_reviews.author: Betty

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Stylish Supportive Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Loved my new Vionic shoes! They fit perfectly and are so comfortable. I definitely would recommend them for both comfort and style!
customer_reviews.author: Paola Di Marco Sedimar Developments

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes! Wore them 2 days in a row to work and they are extremely comfortable. Great heel height and cushioning. Love the Velcro as it makes them super adjustable!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Sacra

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and feelmfor someone with severe PF in her ...
customer_reviews.text: Great fit and feelmfor someone with severe PF in her feet. Thank you for making something that is dressy and orthopedic!
customer_reviews.author: elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Great fitting shoe
customer_reviews.text: Great fitting shoe. This is probably the only brand of shoe I can buy without trying on first, and it fit and feel great on my feet. Thanks for a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Style and pain free comfort
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable. Wore them all night long and had NO foot pain. Love them
customer_reviews.author: YPM

customer_reviews.title: ... the strip on the ankle and the arch is poor.
customer_reviews.text: Very uncomfortable the strip on the ankle and the arch is poor.
customer_reviews.author: Ana Molina

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love Vionics! I have really bad plantar fasciitis and heel spurs and I can wear heels again and really stylish shoes!! I have bought heels, sandals, boots and slippers....every one is just as healing on my feet.....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great looking and so supportive
customer_reviews.text: These shoes fit well and I wore them all day at the Derby with no pain. A miracle!
customer_reviews.author: Heidi H Potter

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes
customer_reviews.text: Liked that the thick ankle strap hides my fleshy ankles
customer_reviews.author: John Babbo

customer_reviews.title: Foot problems
customer_reviews.text: You want a shoe you can wear all evening, this is it.
customer_reviews.author: Em

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I liked these shoes but the heel ended up being a little too high for me.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these...they support your ankle while making you feel beautiful in a heel.
customer_reviews.author: Lori C Borges

customer_reviews.title: Love these. I've been wearing them to work
customer_reviews.text: Love these. I've been wearing them to work. They are still comfortable after 9 hours of moderate activity.
customer_reviews.author: Michele C.

customer_reviews.title: Love these, but pricey
customer_reviews.text: Love them, can adjust toe and ankle for right fit. Just pricey.
customer_reviews.author: Jean Leonard

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic shoes! So hard to find dressy sandals that don't pinch my toes!
customer_reviews.author: Melinda

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: They fit as expected, but the material is very stiff.
customer_reviews.author: kellyon10

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I have been having trouble with my hip and these help tremendously!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Shoe is too large and my foot slides up and ...
customer_reviews.text: Shoe is too large and my foot slides up and down; makes arch constantly in wrong place; which makes walking extremely uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Waller

customer_reviews.title: Cute but...
customer_reviews.text: This shoe is nice and although runs a bit big, you can adjust the ankle and front straps. I didn't like how think the ankle strap was thick and the overall shoe didn't feel right on my feet.
customer_reviews.author: Reader & Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Wore these to a wedding and I could have danced all night!
customer_reviews.text: These are my 1st pair of Vionics and I will be buying more of them. I got them for a wedding and I haven't worn heels in 3 years - we live in Alaska currently, and it is very casual here. I wore them for about 10 hours that day, after minimal breaking in time (maybe an hour?) Due to the awesome orthotic footbed and wide velcro straps on both the toe and around the ankle, my feet were still comfortable after a long day on my feet. That is the first time ever, in my 65 years, that I kept heels on for the whole day. An amazing shoe!!
customer_reviews.author: S. Collins

product_meta.title: Vionic Women's Solana Block Heels- Ladies Adjustable Heel Sandals with Concealed Orthotic Support
product_meta.description: Pep Solana's modest bock-stacked heel lends stability as well as style to this warm-weather favorite. It features a strap across the vamp and ankle and easy hook-and-loop closure.
feature_bullets: Hook and loop closure for adjustability. Leather upper. Man-made Footbed. Durable Rubber Outsole. 2.5 " Heel Height. Received American Podiatric Medical Association Seal of Acceptance.

YOUR NEW FAVORITE SANDALS: Pep Solana's modest bock-stacked heel lends stability as well as style to this warm-weather favorite. It features a strap across the vamp and ankle and easy hook-and-loop closure.
EVERYDAY SUPPORT: A podiatrist-designed footbed built into every pair of Vionic sandals, slippers, active shoes and flats promotes stability from the ground up.
VIONIC SHOES: Vionic brings together style and science, combining innovative biomechanics with the most coveted trends.
